    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseSettings

        public BaseSettings(java.lang.String filename,
                    int version)
        Constructor for BaseSettings class. All that's strictly requires is the filename and version of the settings file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file name of the settings file.
        version - The version of the settings file.

    • Method Detail

      • writeSettingsToFile

        public abstract void writeSettingsToFile(java.lang.String string,
                                         android.content.Context context)
        Writes the provided string to the settings file.
        Parameters:
        string - The string to be written to the settings file.
        context - The app context (for determining where the file is).

      • createSettingsFile

        public abstract void createSettingsFile(android.content.Context context)
        Creates a new settings file with default values.
        Parameters:
        context - The app context used to determine the file location.

      • parseSettings

        public void parseSettings(java.lang.String[] strings)
        Parses the settings from the settings file into booleans based on the corresponding key(s).

        In the overridden version this should actually execute instructions instead of just returning.

        Parameters:
        strings - The string array containing the various key:value pairs read from the settings file.

      • parseSettings

        public void parseSettings(org.json.JSONObject jsonObject)
                   throws org.json.JSONException
        Parses settings to be applied to the static variables from the provided JSON object.

        In the overridden version this should actually execute instructions instead of just returning.

        Parameters:
        jsonObject - The JSON object containing the values to be parsed into settings.
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - Thrown if there was an issue with parsing any values.

      • readFromSettingsFile

        @Nullable
public java.lang.Object readFromSettingsFile(java.io.File file)
        Reads the object from the settings file.

        In the overridden version the object should be specified.

        Parameters:
        file - The settings file.
        Returns:
        The object read from the settings file.

      • readFromSettingsFile

        @Nullable
public java.lang.Object readFromSettingsFile(android.content.Context context)
        Reads the object from the settings file.

        In the overridden version the object should be specified.

        Parameters:
        context - The context to get the settings file by.
        Returns:
        The object read from the settings file.
